Project Description

Xoqal is a modern open source application framework targeting .NET 4+ platforms. It supports web and win application with the same infrastructure.

Our first target is producing good software using good design patterns.

Xoqal /zoʊqɑːl/ means coal in Persian language. We choose this name because many years ago in Iran the great scientists were distributing free coal and paper as writing tools among the people to give them a learning opportunity.

I'd like to give special thanks to Mark Seemann for his helps.
